attributes.action: create a list with the funniest "rejected e-petitions"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear civil servant who is reading this,

I know this petition will be rejected, but that's the whole point. 

Some of the "rejected petitions" are hilarious, due to their very naive content or plain stupidity. So I'd like to ask you to create some kind of "best of" list with the funniest petitions. 
As this is a serious website, it may be wise to show this list on a different webpage. Or perhaps some newspapers would be interested to publish a few gems?
Maybe you could organize a "stupid petition of the month" contest?

Anyway, I'm sure you must read hundreds of e-petitions daily so when you find a humorous one, don't hesitate to forward it to me.

Thanks a lot for taking time to read me.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
